title: Maršová-Rašov
text:
Maršová-Rašov is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in <a href="Byt%C4%8Da%20District">Bytča District</a> in the <a href="%C5%BDilina%20Region">Žilina Region</a> of northern <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
History.
In <a href="history">historical records</a> the <a href="village">village</a> was first mentioned in 1400.
Geography.
The <a href="municipality">municipality</a> lies at an <a href="altitude">altitude</a> of 310 metres and covers an <a href="area">area</a> of . It has a <a href="population">population</a> of about 780 people.
